name: CopyFilesOverSSH
description: Copy files or build artifacts to a remote machine over SSH
author: Microsoft Corporation
instanceNameFormat: Securely copy files to the remote machine

inputs.name: sshEndpoint
inputs.label: SSH endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: SSH endpoint with connection details for the remote machine.

inputs.name: sourceFolder
inputs.label: Source folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source folder for the files to copy to the remote machine.  Empty is the root of the repo.  Use [variables](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988) if files are not in the repo. Example: $(agent.builddirectory)

inputs.name: contents
inputs.label: Contents
inputs.helpMarkDown: File paths to include as part of the copy. Supports multiple lines of minimatch patterns. [More Information](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=821894)

inputs.name: targetFolder
inputs.label: Target folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target folder on the remote machine to where files will be copied. Example: /home/user/MySite.

inputs.name: cleanTargetFolder
inputs.label: Clean target folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delete all existing files in the target folder before copying.

inputs.name: overwrite
inputs.label: Overwrite
inputs.helpMarkDown: Replace existing files in the target folder.

inputs.name: flattenFolders
inputs.label: Flatten folders
inputs.helpMarkDown: Flatten the folder structure and copy all files into the specified target folder on the remote machine.

messages.UseDefaultPort: Using port 22 which is the default for SSH since no port was specified.
messages.SourceNotFolder: Source folder has to be a valid folder path.
messages.CleanTargetFolder: Cleaning target folder %s on the remote machine
messages.CleanTargetFolderFailed: Failed to clean the target folder on the remote machine. %s
messages.NothingToCopy: No files were found matching the patterns specified to copy to the remote machine.
messages.CopyingFiles: Found %s files to copy to the remote machine.
messages.StartedFileCopy: Copying file %s to %s on remote machine.
messages.CopyCompleted: Completed copying %s files to the remote machine.
messages.FileExists: File %s cannot be copied to the remote machine because it already exists and the 'Overwrite' option is disabled.
messages.SettingUpSSHConnection: Setting up SSH connection to remote host %s.
messages.ConnectionNotSetup: SSH connection is not set up.
messages.ConnectionFailed: Failed to connect to remote machine. Verify the SSH endpoint details. %s.
messages.RemoteCmdExecutionErr: Command %s failed with errors on remote machine. %s.
messages.CheckLogForStdErr: Check the build log for STDERR from the command.
messages.UploadFileFailed: Failed to upload %s to %s on remote machine. %s.
